name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser
description: A gentle, non-foaming cleanser that removes dirt and oil without stripping the skin barrier. Good for normal to dry skin and morning or night use.

name: Paula's Choice BHA
description: A leave-on 2% BHA (salicylic acid) exfoliant that helps unclog pores, smooth texture, and reduce blackheads. Best used at night a few times per week.

name: Arazlo
description: A prescription-strength topical retinoid used to treat acne and improve skin texture. Typically applied at night on dry skin as directed by a dermatologist.

name: Onexton
description: A prescription topical treatment combining benzoyl peroxide and clindamycin, used to reduce acne-causing bacteria and inflammation. Usually applied once daily.

name: Aquaphor Lip Treatment
description: An occlusive lip treatment that locks in moisture and protects dry, chapped lips. Ideal as the last step of an evening routine or as needed throughout the day.

name: Amarte Aqua Veil
description: A lightweight, hydrating gel-cream moisturizer that adds moisture without heaviness. Works well for normal to combination or slightly oily skin.

name: Amarte Exfolipowder
description: A gentle, water-activated powder cleanser and exfoliant that helps smooth texture. Typically used a few times per week instead of a regular cleanser.

name: Dr. Haushka Rose Day Cream
description: A rich, nourishing day cream with rose extracts designed for dry or sensitive skin. Best used in the morning or cooler weather for extra moisture.

name: La Roche-Posay SPF
description: A broad-spectrum facial sunscreen that protects against UVA/UVB rays. Should be used every morning as the last step in the skincare routine.
